pkgmetadata.longdescription: One-Sided Cross-Validation // Functions for implementing different versions of the OSCV method in the kernel regression and density estimation frameworks. The package mainly supports the following articles: (1) Savchuk, O.Y., Hart, J.D. (2017). Fully robust one-sided cross-validation for regression functions. Computational Statistics, doi:10.1007/s00180-017-0713-7 and (2) Savchuk, O.Y. (2017). One-sided cross-validation for nonsmooth density functions, arXiv:1703.05157.
